# XCLV

> XCLV is an investment company that invests in visionary geniuses when nobody else will. Founded by V. Konovalov.

XCLV identifies and backs extraordinary founders and builders at the earliest stages â€” before consensus forms around their potential. The company focuses on high-conviction investments in individuals with outsized vision.
